Title: Pokemon Company announces $5 million in donations to nonprofit orgs
Author: Arda Ocal
Description: The Pokemon Company International has announced that it will donate a minimum of $5 million to nonprofit organizations around the world.

Title: The Pokemon Company sparks backlash after ‚Äúdeleting‚Äù Unite trailer
Author: Brent Koepp
Description: On July 9, The Pokemon Company abruptly deleted the Unite reveal trailer before re-uploading a new version. The move has sparked backlash from some players who speculate it was to hide the overwhelmingly negative dislike ratio.

Title: Pokemon Go-Vid: Niantic, Inc. Launches Local Business Recovery Initiative
Author: Moor Insights & Strategy; Zane Pickett
Description: On June 15, Niantic launched a local business recovery initiative, in which it will give aid to 1,000 small businesses across the globe by transforming them into Pokestops and Gyms.

Title: Japan's Baskin-Robbins Stores To Offer New Pok√©mon-Themed Ice Cream And Desserts
Author: Abby Espiritu
Description: Beginning July 20, Baskin-Robbins stores in Japan will begin selling Pok√©mon-themed ice cream treats based on the upcoming movie Pokemon Coco.

Title: Pok√©mon Company Announces Massive Expansion: Champion's Path
Author: Collier Jennings
Description: The Pok√©mon Trading Card Game has introduced a new expansion titled Champion's Path, featuring cards based on the Sword and Shield games.

Title: The Pok√©mon Company Establishes Shanghai Subsidiary, Pok√©mon Shanghai Toy
Author: Hongyu Chen
Description: Japanese company The Pok√©mon Company (TPC) has established its Chinese subsidiary in the city of Shanghai, which is called Pok√©mon Shanghai Toy Limited Company according to Chinese credit and rating tool Tianyancha.

Title: CASETiFY Reunites with The Pok√©mon Company for Another New Collection
Author: CASETiFY
Description: Inspired by the concept of "Past, Present, and Future," the latest CASETiFY & Pok√©mon collection plays on classic '90s trends, with cases featuring iconic patterns from the decade like bold checkerboards and tie-dye treatments. The premium quality accessories will showcase the fan-favorite Pok√©mon Pikachu, Bulbasaur, Charmander, and Squirtle on drop-resistant cases, incorporating the colorful styling and CASETiFY elements that fans around the world have come to know and love.

Title: Pok√©mon Go maker Niantic doubles Black Lives Matter donation to $10m
Author: Tom Phillips
Description: Pok√©mon Go developer Niantic has doubled its donation to Black Lives Matter charities and initiatives, from a minimum of $5m up to a final total of $10m.

Title: Upcoming Pok√©mon Movie Coco Gets A Brand New Trailer, Confirms Christmas Day Release Date
Author: Rachel Gonzalez
Description: No word yet on how or when Pok√©mon Coco will be coming to the rest of the world, but Japan certainly has a holiday hit on their hands.

Title: Pok√©mon Virtual Fest virtual theme park coming to Japan
Author: ATTRACTIONS MAGAZINE STAFF
Description: The Pok√©mon Company has announced that it will be hosting Pok√©mon Virtual Fest, an unfinished virtual theme park, this month in Japan.

Title: Pok√©mon Center Japan announces new line of cutesy merch
Author: Marcus Ramirez
Description: The Pok√©mon Company has revealed a new line of merch focusing on soft colors and silly scenes! A few adorable examples are Pok√©mon sleeping in Wooloo‚Äôs wool, a yamper playing with a Voltorb like a ball, and even a recreation of The Tortoise and the Hare with Raboot and Chewtle! The new line will be adapted into plushies, tote bags, mugs and a bunch of other knick-knacks and apparel.

Title: Pokemon Sword and Shield Are Now Third Best Selling Pokemon Games
Author: Sam Woods
Description: Pokemon Sword and Shield lifetime sales top 18 million in around nine months.

Title: Pokemon Rumble Rush Officially Shuts Down
Author: Tanner Dedmon
Description: Pokemon Rumble Rush has officially come to an end this week with the mobile Pokemon game no longer playable as of July 22nd. Gone are the listings for the game in the mobile markets as service for Pokemon Rumble Rush ended to make it so that people couldn’t download the game anymore nor can they play whatever version of it they have on their devices.

Title: POKEMON SMILE WILL HELP YOU BRUSH YOUR TEETH
Author: Shannon Grixti
Description: The Pokemon Company has kicked of its Pokemon Presents presentation with a new free Pokemon experience called ‘Pokemon Smile’.

Title: Pokémon Go Wants to Make 3D Scans of the Whole World for 'Planet-Scale Augmented Reality Experiences.' Is that Good?
Author: Marcus Carter and Ben Egliston
Description: In 2016, the mobile game Pokémon Go sent hundreds of millions of players wandering the streets in search of virtual monsters. In the process it helped popularise augmented reality (AR) technology, which overlays computer-generated imagery on real-world environments.

Title: New Pokemon Snap announced for Nintendo Switch
Author: Steve Wright
Description: New Pokemon Snap was announced for Nintendo Switch overnight as part of a Pokemon Presents stream.
